messages.title: A fresh start for Exampleston
messages.content: John is standing to be the next MP for Exampleston to give the area a much needed fresh start

keyPolicies.policyDescription: Fighting to bring back community policing and save the local station from closure
Working for realistic parking charges and better bus services, and to stop Conservative Metro chaos
John opposes Conservative boundary changes that would slice Exampleston in two

mentions.tacticalSituation: John opposes Conservative boundary changes that would slice Exampleston in two

issues.economy: Working for realistic parking charges and better bus services
issues.governance: John opposes Conservative boundary changes that would slice Exampleston in two

housing.content: Fighting to bring back community policing and save the local station from closure

leaflet.personalStatement: It's time for a fresh start with a local resident putting Exampleston first

endorsements.endorsement: John is a tireless community campaigner

quotes.text: It's time for a fresh start with a local resident putting Exampleston first - John Doe
John is committed to Exampleston - he'll make a great MP
